articles.author: By Robert Iddiols and Amy Cassidy, CNN
articles.title: Hungary 'has no place in the EU anymore,' Dutch leader says - CNN
articles.description: Hungary "has no place" in the European Union after passing a controversial new bill banning LGBTQ content in schools, Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte said on Thursday.
articles.content:
Hungary has no place in the European Union after passing a controversial new bill banning LGBTQ content in schools, Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte said on Thursday.

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: UK carrier EE introduces EU roaming charges following Brexit - The Verge
articles.description: UK carrier EE is reintroducing roaming charges for customers traveling to EU countries from January next year. Customers will be charged a flat fee of £2 (around $2.78) a day while in 47 “European destinations.”
articles.content:
New fees will come into force in January 2022
Photo by Belinda Jiao/SOPA Images/LightRocket via Getty Images
